Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Eugene>、カレギア軍の船が もっとたくさん集まった事件ってナニ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Eugene>, just what was that incident that the military needed all those ships for?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……アイフリードという伝説の海賊を崇拝する 海賊団が北の海を荒らし回ったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Well, a band of pirates who revered the legendary pirate Aifread were plundering the northern seas.

Entry.JapaneseText: 海賊一味の中には能力者も大勢いたために <Blue>王の盾<White>にも出動命令が下った。
Entry.EnglishText: Since there were many Force users among the crew, the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> was also called in to intervene.

Entry.JapaneseText: その時に<Annie>の父親、バースと意気投合した…… もう、二十年近く前の事になる……
Entry.EnglishText: It was at that time that I befriended <Annie>'s father, Barrs... It's been nearly twenty years since then...
